goals.title: Reach 97kg series weight in bench press
goals.description: I want to gain back my pushing power to the level where it was some years ago. However, this is not the most important thing now as running is the prio.

action_items.action_summary: New way to train my chest with pre-burnout series.

goals.title: Learn Python deeply
goals.description: I want to learn Python basics and then dig deep into data science.

goals.title: Go to a different planet
goals.description: I've never ever left Europe in my life, at the age of 23, it's time to do that!

goals.title: Test Kinsta Cloud
goals.description: In 2020, I wanted to reach the space, now I'm OK with reaching just the cloud!
